title: Topic 001 Question 092
body: An e-commerce web application that shares session state on-premises is being migrated to AWS. The application must be fault tolerant, natively highly scalable, and any service interruption should not affect the user experience.
What is the best option to store the session state?
options: Store the session state in Amazon ElastiCache.
Store the session state in Amazon CloudFront.
Store the session state in Amazon S3.
Enable session stickiness using elastic load balancers.
